documents.title: Act No. 42/2023: Official Valencian Paella Recipe
documents.description: Traditional recipe approved by the Parliament of Gastronomia.

documents.title: Bill: Reform of the Valencian Paella Recipe
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Madrid to democratize the recipe.

documents.title: Amendment: Inclusion of Brown Rice
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Naturist to allow brown rice.

documents.title: Amendment: Optional Socarrat
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Modern to make the socarrat optional.

documents.title: Amendment: Protected Designation of Origin
documents.description: Proposal by Rep. Valencia to protect the designation.

documents.title: Plenary Session: Debate on Paella Reform
Judgment 127/2024: Challenge against Paella Reform
documents.description: Ruling of the Supreme Gastronomic Court.

documents.title: Official Gazette of Gastronomia No. 2024-37
documents.description: Official publication of the reform and judgment.

documents.title: Complete Proceedings: Paella Reform
documents.description: Complete dossier of the parliamentary proceedings.

documents.title: Committee on Gastronomy Report
documents.description: Report with conclusions and recommendations on the reform.

documents.title: Citation: Plenary Session on Paella Reform
documents.description: Call to the plenary session debating the paella reform and amendments.

documents.title: Written Question: Saffron Budget Spending
documents.description: Question to the Ministry of Gastronomy about saffron procurement spending.

documents.title: Communication: Committee Report Transmission
documents.description: Transmission of the gastronomy committee report to the plenary.
